name: آدم
miracle_id: Diciptakan langsung oleh Allah dari tanah
miracle_en: Created directly by Allah from clay

sections_id.title: Awal Penciptaan
sections_id.content: Sebelum menciptakan Adam, Allah SWT memberitahu para malaikat bahwa Dia akan menjadikan khalifah di muka bumi. Malaikat bertanya mengapa Allah hendak menjadikan makhluk yang akan membuat kerusakan. Allah menjawab: 'Sesungguhnya Aku mengetahui apa yang tidak kalian ketahui.'

sections_id.title: Proses Penciptaan
sections_id.content: Allah mengutus malaikat untuk mengambil tanah dari berbagai penjuru bumi - tanah merah, putih, hitam. Inilah sebab manusia memiliki warna kulit yang berbeda. Tanah dicampur air menjadi tanah liat, dibiarkan berbau, dibentuk menjadi sosok manusia, dan dikeringkan seperti tembikar.

sections_id.title: Ruh Ditiupkan
sections_id.content: Ketika Allah meniupkan ruh, ruh masuk dari kepala. Saat sampai di hidung, Adam bersin dan mengucapkan 'Alhamdulillah'. Allah menjawab: 'Yarhamukallah'. Ketika sampai di mata, Adam melihat buah-buahan surga. Inilah asal sifat manusia yang tergesa-gesa.

sections_id.title: Diajarkan Nama-nama
sections_id.content: Allah mengajarkan Adam nama-nama segala sesuatu. Kemudian Allah memperlihatkan nama-nama itu kepada malaikat. Malaikat menjawab: 'Maha Suci Engkau, tidak ada yang kami ketahui selain apa yang telah Engkau ajarkan.' Adam menyebutkan seluruh nama itu.

sections_id.title: Iblis Menolak Sujud
sections_id.content: Allah memerintahkan malaikat bersujud kepada Adam. Semua bersujud kecuali Iblis. Allah bertanya: 'Mengapa engkau tidak sujud?' Iblis menjawab sombong: 'Aku lebih baik darinya. Engkau ciptakan aku dari api, sedangkan dia dari tanah.' Iblis dikutuk dan diusir.

sections_id.title: Bertemu Hawa
sections_id.content: Adam ditempatkan di surga namun merasa kesepian. Ia terbangun dan menemukan seorang wanita. Adam bertanya: 'Siapa engkau?' Wanita menjawab: 'Wanita, diciptakan agar engkau merasa tenteram.' Adam menamainya Hawa karena diciptakan dari sesuatu yang hidup.

sections_id.title: Buah Terlarang
sections_id.content: Adam dan Hawa hidup bahagia di surga. Mereka boleh makan dari mana saja kecuali satu pohon. Iblis terus menggoda. Akhirnya keduanya tergoda dan memakan buah terlarang. Seketika itu aurat mereka tersingkap dan mereka malu.

sections_id.title: Turun ke Bumi
sections_id.content: Allah menurunkan Adam, Hawa, dan Iblis ke bumi. Adam turun di India, Hawa di Jeddah. Keduanya terpisah dan tidak bertemu selama bertahun-tahun. Adam menangis penuh penyesalan.

sections_id.title: Bertemu di Arafah
sections_id.content: Setelah sekian lama mencari, Adam dan Hawa akhirnya bertemu kembali di Padang Arafah. Tempat itu dinamakan Arafah yang berarti 'berkenalan'. Mereka bersyukur kepada Allah.

sections_id.title: Menjadi Nabi
sections_id.content: Allah menerima taubat Adam dan mengangkatnya sebagai nabi pertama. Adam mengajarkan keturunannya tentang tauhid dan ibadah. Mereka berkembang biak dan menyebar di bumi.

sections_id.title: Habil dan Qabil
sections_id.content: Dua putra Adam yang terkenal adalah Habil dan Qabil. Keduanya diminta berkurban kepada Allah. Kurban Habil diterima, Qabil ditolak. Karena iri, Qabil membunuh Habil - pembunuhan pertama dalam sejarah.

sections_id.title: Wafatnya Adam
sections_id.content: Nabi Adam hidup sekitar 1000 tahun. Ketika wafat, para malaikat memandikan, mengkafani, menyalatkan, dan menguburkannya. Adam dimakamkan di Gua Abu Qubais dekat Mekkah.

sections_en.title: The Beginning
sections_en.content: Before creating Adam, Allah informed the angels that He would place a vicegerent on Earth. The angels asked why He would create a being that would cause corruption. Allah replied: 'Indeed, I know what you do not know.'

sections_en.title: Creation Process
sections_en.content: Allah sent angels to gather clay from various parts of the earth - red, white, and black soil. This is why humans have different skin colors. The clay was mixed with water, shaped into human form, and dried like pottery.

sections_en.title: Soul Breathed In
sections_en.content: When Allah breathed the soul in, it entered from the head. When it reached the nose, Adam sneezed and said 'Alhamdulillah'. Allah replied: 'May Allah have mercy on you'. This is the origin of human hastiness.

sections_en.title: Taught All Names
sections_en.content: Allah taught Adam the names of all things. Then Allah presented these names to the angels. The angels replied: 'Glory be to You, we have no knowledge except what You taught us.' Adam then named them all.

sections_en.title: Satan's Refusal
sections_en.content: Allah commanded the angels to prostrate to Adam. All prostrated except Iblis. Allah asked: 'Why did you not prostrate?' Iblis arrogantly replied: 'I am better than him.' Iblis was cursed and expelled.

sections_en.title: Meeting Eve
sections_en.content: Adam was placed in Paradise but felt lonely. He awoke to find a woman near him. Adam asked: 'Who are you?' She answered: 'A woman, created so you may find comfort.' Adam named her Hawa (Eve).

sections_en.title: Forbidden Fruit
sections_en.content: Adam and Eve lived happily in Paradise. They could eat from anywhere except one tree. Satan continuously tempted them. Eventually they ate from the forbidden tree. Instantly they felt ashamed.

sections_en.title: Descent to Earth
sections_en.content: Allah sent Adam, Eve, and Satan down to Earth. Adam landed in India, Eve in Jeddah. They were separated and didn't meet for many years. Adam wept with deep regret.

sections_en.title: Reunion at Arafat
sections_en.content: After searching for so long, Adam and Eve finally reunited at the Plain of Arafat. The place was named Arafat meaning 'recognition'. They thanked Allah.

sections_en.title: Becoming Prophet
sections_en.content: Allah accepted Adam's repentance and appointed him as the first prophet. Adam taught his descendants about monotheism. They multiplied and spread across the Earth.

sections_en.title: Abel and Cain
sections_en.content: Two famous sons were Abel and Cain. Both offered sacrifice to Allah. Abel's was accepted, Cain's rejected. Out of jealousy, Cain killed Abel - the first murder in history.

sections_en.title: Adam's Death
sections_en.content: Prophet Adam lived for approximately 1000 years. When he passed away, angels washed, shrouded, prayed over, and buried him near Makkah.

name: إدريس
miracle_id: Diangkat ke langit dalam keadaan hidup
miracle_en: Raised to heaven while still alive

sections_id.title: Keturunan Adam
sections_id.content: Nabi Idris adalah keturunan Nabi Adam yang hidup beberapa generasi setelahnya. Nama aslinya adalah Akhnukh. Beliau adalah keturunan kelima dari Nabi Adam melalui garis Syits.

sections_id.title: Penemu Tulisan
sections_id.content: Nabi Idris adalah orang pertama yang menulis dengan pena. Beliau menjadi pelopor penggunaan tulisan untuk menyebarkan ilmu pengetahuan.

sections_id.title: Menjahit Pakaian
sections_id.content: Beliau dikenal sebagai orang pertama yang menjahit pakaian. Sebelumnya manusia hanya menggunakan kulit binatang sebagai penutup tubuh.

sections_id.title: Ilmu Astronomi
sections_id.content: Nabi Idris mengajarkan kaumnya berbagai ilmu pengetahuan termasuk astronomi dan matematika. Beliau sangat berilmu dan bijaksana.

sections_id.title: Dakwah dan Ibadah
sections_id.content: Sepanjang hidupnya, Nabi Idris berdakwah mengajak kaumnya menyembah Allah semata. Beliau sangat tekun beribadah dan banyak berpuasa.

sections_id.title: Diangkat ke Langit
sections_id.content: Allah SWT mengangkat Nabi Idris ke tempat yang tinggi dalam keadaan hidup. Menurut sebagian ulama, beliau diangkat ke langit keempat.

sections_en.title: Descendant of Adam
sections_en.content: Prophet Idris was a descendant of Prophet Adam who lived several generations later. His original name was Enoch.

sections_en.title: Inventor of Writing
sections_en.content: Prophet Idris was the first person to write with a pen. He pioneered the use of writing to spread knowledge.

sections_en.title: Sewing Garments
sections_en.content: He was known as the first to sew clothes. Before him, humans only used animal skins as body covering.

sections_en.title: Astronomy Knowledge
sections_en.content: Prophet Idris taught his people various sciences including astronomy and mathematics. He was very knowledgeable and wise.

sections_en.title: Preaching and Worship
sections_en.content: Throughout his life, Prophet Idris preached, calling people to worship Allah alone. He was very dedicated to worship.

sections_en.title: Raised to Heaven
sections_en.content: Allah raised Prophet Idris to a high station while still alive. According to some scholars, he was raised to the fourth heaven.

name: نوح
miracle_id: Bahtera raksasa menyelamatkan dari banjir
miracle_en: Giant Ark saved from the great flood

sections_id.title: Diutus ke Kaumnya
sections_id.content: Nabi Nuh diutus kepada kaumnya yang menyembah berhala bernama Wadd, Suwa', Yaghuts, Ya'uq, dan Nasr. Awalnya itu adalah nama orang-orang shaleh yang kemudian disembah.

sections_id.title: 950 Tahun Dakwah
sections_id.content: Nabi Nuh berdakwah dengan sangat sabar selama 950 tahun! Beliau mengajak kaumnya siang dan malam. Namun hanya sedikit yang beriman, tidak lebih dari 80 orang.

sections_id.title: Penolakan Kaum
sections_id.content: Kaumnya menuduh Nuh gila dan mengancam akan merajamnya. Para pemuka kaum menyuruh rakyat menutup telinga agar tidak mendengar dakwah Nuh.

sections_id.title: Putra yang Durhaka
sections_id.content: Putra Nabi Nuh bernama Kan'an termasuk yang menolak beriman. Istrinya juga kafir. Ini menunjukkan bahwa hidayah adalah hak Allah semata.

sections_id.title: Membangun Bahtera
sections_id.content: Allah memerintahkan Nuh membangun bahtera besar di daratan jauh dari laut. Kaumnya mengejeknya dan menganggapnya gila.

sections_id.title: Memasuki Bahtera
sections_id.content: Ketika bahtera selesai, Allah memerintahkan Nuh memasukkan sepasang dari setiap jenis hewan dan orang-orang beriman. Hewan-hewan datang dengan sendirinya.

sections_id.title: Banjir Besar
sections_id.content: Hujan sangat deras turun dan air memancar dari dalam bumi. Banjir besar melanda seluruh dunia. Air naik setinggi gunung-gunung. Kan'an menolak naik bahtera.

sections_id.title: Mendarat di Judi
sections_id.content: Setelah banjir surut, bahtera mendarat di Gunung Judi. Allah berfirman: 'Hai bumi, telanlah airmu!' Nabi Nuh dan pengikutnya turun dan memulai peradaban baru.

sections_en.title: Sent to His People
sections_en.content: Prophet Noah was sent to his people who worshipped idols named Wadd, Suwa', Yaghuts, Ya'uq, and Nasr.

sections_en.title: 950 Years of Preaching
sections_en.content: Prophet Noah preached with incredible patience for 950 years! He invited his people day and night. Yet only a few believed, no more than 80 people.

sections_en.title: People's Rejection
sections_en.content: His people accused Noah of madness and threatened to stone him. The leaders told people to cover their ears.

sections_en.title: Rebellious Son
sections_en.content: Noah's son Kan'an was among those who refused to believe. His wife was also a disbeliever. This shows guidance belongs to Allah alone.

sections_en.title: Building the Ark
sections_en.content: Allah commanded Noah to build a massive ark on dry land far from any sea. His people ridiculed him.

sections_en.title: Boarding the Ark
sections_en.content: When the ark was completed, Allah commanded Noah to load a pair of every animal species and the believers.

sections_en.title: The Great Flood
sections_en.content: Torrential rain came and water gushed from the earth. A great flood engulfed the entire world. Kan'an refused to board.

sections_en.title: Landing at Judi
sections_en.content: After the flood receded, the ark landed on Mount Judi. Allah said: 'O earth, swallow your water!' Prophet Noah and his followers began a new civilization.

name: هود
miracle_id: Selamat dari angin topan yang menghancurkan kaum Ad
miracle_en: Saved from the destructive wind that destroyed the Ad people

sections_id.title: Kaum Ad yang Sombong
sections_id.content: Kaum Ad adalah keturunan Nuh yang tinggal di Ahqaf, Yaman. Mereka membangun bangunan-bangunan tinggi dan megah. Mereka sangat kuat dan sombong.

sections_id.title: Penyembahan Berhala
sections_id.content: Kaum Ad menyembah berhala dan melupakan Allah. Mereka menindas kaum lemah dan berbuat sewenang-wenang. Allah mengutus Nabi Hud untuk membimbing mereka.

sections_id.title: Dakwah Nabi Hud
sections_id.content: Nabi Hud mengajak kaumnya menyembah Allah semata dan meninggalkan berhala. Beliau mengingatkan mereka akan nikmat Allah. Namun mereka menolak dengan keras.

sections_id.title: Ancaman Azab
sections_id.content: Nabi Hud memperingatkan kaumnya akan azab Allah jika mereka tidak bertaubat. Mereka malah menantang dan meminta azab itu segera datang.

sections_id.title: Angin Topan
sections_id.content: Allah mengirimkan angin topan yang sangat dahsyat selama 7 malam 8 hari. Angin itu menghancurkan segala sesuatu. Kaum Ad yang sombong binasa.

sections_id.title: Keselamatan Orang Beriman
sections_id.content: Nabi Hud dan para pengikutnya yang beriman diselamatkan oleh Allah. Mereka dilindungi dari angin topan yang menghancurkan. Kisah ini menjadi pelajaran bagi umat manusia.

sections_en.title: The Arrogant Ad People
sections_en.content: The Ad people were descendants of Noah living in Ahqaf, Yemen. They built tall magnificent buildings. They were very strong and arrogant.

sections_en.title: Idol Worship
sections_en.content: The Ad people worshipped idols and forgot Allah. They oppressed the weak and acted tyrannically. Allah sent Prophet Hud to guide them.

sections_en.title: Hud's Preaching
sections_en.content: Prophet Hud invited his people to worship Allah alone. He reminded them of Allah's blessings. But they rejected him strongly.

sections_en.title: Warning of Punishment
sections_en.content: Prophet Hud warned his people of Allah's punishment if they didn't repent. They challenged him and asked for the punishment to come.

sections_en.title: The Devastating Wind
sections_en.content: Allah sent a devastating wind for 7 nights and 8 days. The wind destroyed everything. The arrogant Ad people perished.

sections_en.title: Salvation of Believers
sections_en.content: Prophet Hud and his faithful followers were saved by Allah. They were protected from the destructive wind.

name: صالح
miracle_id: Unta betina keluar dari batu karang
miracle_en: She-camel emerged from a rock

sections_id.title: Kaum Tsamud
sections_id.content: Kaum Tsamud tinggal di daerah Hijr (Madain Salih). Mereka ahli memahat rumah di gunung-gunung. Mereka makmur namun menyembah berhala.

sections_id.title: Diutusnya Nabi Shalih
sections_id.content: Allah mengutus Nabi Shalih dari kalangan mereka sendiri. Beliau mengajak mereka menyembah Allah dan meninggalkan berhala. Mereka menolak dan meminta bukti.

sections_id.title: Mukjizat Unta
sections_id.content: Kaum Tsamud meminta Nabi Shalih mengeluarkan unta dari batu karang. Dengan izin Allah, batu karang terbelah dan keluarlah unta betina yang besar dan hamil. Ini adalah mukjizat nyata.

sections_id.title: Aturan Giliran Air
sections_id.content: Nabi Shalih menetapkan aturan: satu hari unta minum, satu hari kaum minum. Unta itu memberi susu yang cukup untuk seluruh kaum. Namun mereka tetap tidak bersyukur.

sections_id.title: Unta Dibunuh
sections_id.content: Sembilan orang jahat berkomplot membunuh unta itu. Mereka menyembelih unta mukjizat tersebut. Nabi Shalih memperingatkan bahwa azab akan datang dalam 3 hari.

sections_id.title: Azab Suara Dahsyat
sections_id.content: Pada hari ketiga, datanglah suara dahsyat dari langit yang menghancurkan kaum Tsamud. Mereka semua binasa kecuali Nabi Shalih dan para pengikutnya yang beriman.

sections_en.title: The Thamud People
sections_en.content: The Thamud people lived in Hijr (Madain Salih). They were skilled at carving homes in mountains. They were prosperous but worshipped idols.

sections_en.title: Prophet Salih Sent
sections_en.content: Allah sent Prophet Salih from among them. He invited them to worship Allah. They rejected and demanded proof.

sections_en.title: The Camel Miracle
sections_en.content: They asked Prophet Salih to bring a camel from a rock. By Allah's permission, the rock split and a large pregnant she-camel emerged. This was a clear miracle.

sections_en.title: Water Sharing Rule
sections_en.content: Prophet Salih established a rule: one day the camel drinks, one day the people drink. The camel provided milk for everyone. But they were ungrateful.

sections_en.title: Camel Killed
sections_en.content: Nine evil men plotted and killed the camel. They slaughtered the miraculous camel. Prophet Salih warned that punishment would come in 3 days.

sections_en.title: The Devastating Sound
sections_en.content: On the third day, a devastating sound from the sky destroyed the Thamud people. They all perished except Prophet Salih and his faithful followers.

name: إبراهيم
miracle_id: Selamat dari api yang menjadi dingin
miracle_en: Saved from fire that became cool

sections_id.title: Mencari Tuhan
sections_id.content: Ibrahim kecil hidup di tengah kaum penyembah berhala. Ia merenungkan bintang, bulan, dan matahari, namun semuanya terbenam. Ia menyimpulkan bahwa Tuhan yang benar tidak terbenam.

sections_id.title: Menghancurkan Berhala
sections_id.content: Ketika kaumnya pergi ke pesta, Ibrahim menghancurkan semua berhala kecuali yang terbesar. Ia menggantungkan kapak di leher berhala besar. Ketika ditanya, ia berkata: 'Tanyakan pada berhala besar itu.'

sections_id.title: Dibakar Hidup-hidup
sections_id.content: Raja Namrud memerintahkan Ibrahim dibakar. Api besar dinyalakan. Ibrahim dilemparkan ke dalam api. Namun Allah berfirman: 'Hai api, jadilah dingin dan selamat bagi Ibrahim.'

sections_id.title: Hijrah ke Palestina
sections_id.content: Ibrahim hijrah bersama istrinya Sarah dan keponakannya Luth. Mereka menuju Palestina, kemudian ke Mesir, dan kembali ke Palestina.

sections_id.title: Hajar dan Ismail
sections_id.content: Sarah tidak memiliki anak dan menyarankan Ibrahim menikahi Hajar. Lahirlah Ismail. Atas perintah Allah, Ibrahim membawa Hajar dan Ismail ke lembah tandus di Mekah.

sections_id.title: Zamzam dan Ka'bah
sections_id.content: Di padang pasir, Hajar berlari antara Shafa dan Marwa mencari air. Allah memunculkan mata air Zamzam. Kemudian Ibrahim dan Ismail membangun Ka'bah.

sections_id.title: Ujian Menyembelih
sections_id.content: Allah memerintahkan Ibrahim menyembelih Ismail dalam mimpi. Keduanya patuh. Ketika pisau diayunkan, Allah mengganti Ismail dengan domba. Ini menjadi asal kurban Idul Adha.

sections_en.title: Seeking God
sections_en.content: Young Ibrahim lived among idol worshippers. He pondered the stars, moon, and sun, but they all set. He concluded that the true God doesn't set.

sections_en.title: Destroying Idols
sections_en.content: When his people went to a festival, Ibrahim destroyed all idols except the largest. He hung an axe on the big idol. When asked, he said: 'Ask the big one.'

sections_en.title: Thrown into Fire
sections_en.content: King Namrud ordered Ibrahim to be burned. A huge fire was lit. Ibrahim was thrown in. But Allah said: 'O fire, be cool and safe for Ibrahim.'

sections_en.title: Migration to Palestine
sections_en.content: Ibrahim migrated with his wife Sarah and nephew Lut. They went to Palestine, then Egypt, and returned to Palestine.

sections_en.title: Hajar and Ismail
sections_en.content: Sarah had no children and suggested Ibrahim marry Hajar. Ismail was born. By Allah's command, Ibrahim took Hajar and Ismail to a barren valley in Mecca.

sections_en.title: Zamzam and Ka'bah
sections_en.content: In the desert, Hajar ran between Safa and Marwa seeking water. Allah brought forth the Zamzam spring. Later Ibrahim and Ismail built the Ka'bah.

sections_en.title: Sacrifice Test
sections_en.content: Allah commanded Ibrahim to sacrifice Ismail in a dream. Both obeyed. When the knife was swung, Allah replaced Ismail with a ram. This became the origin of Eid al-Adha sacrifice.

name: لوط
miracle_id: Selamat dari azab yang menghancurkan kaumnya
miracle_en: Saved from punishment that destroyed his people

sections_id.title: Keponakan Ibrahim
sections_id.content: Nabi Luth adalah keponakan Nabi Ibrahim. Beliau ikut berhijrah bersama Ibrahim dari Ur ke Palestina. Beliau kemudian diutus ke kota Sodom.

sections_id.title: Kaum yang Menyimpang
sections_id.content: Kaum Luth melakukan perbuatan keji yang belum pernah dilakukan manusia sebelumnya - yaitu homoseksual. Mereka juga merampok dan berbuat jahat.

sections_id.title: Dakwah yang Ditolak
sections_id.content: Nabi Luth mengajak kaumnya bertaubat dan meninggalkan perbuatan keji. Namun mereka menolak dan mengancam mengusir Luth dari kota.

sections_id.title: Malaikat Datang
sections_id.content: Allah mengutus malaikat dalam rupa pemuda tampan ke rumah Luth. Kaumnya datang mengerumuni rumah dengan niat jahat. Luth sangat tertekan.

sections_id.title: Azab dari Langit
sections_id.content: Malaikat menyuruh Luth pergi bersama keluarganya dan tidak menoleh ke belakang. Kemudian hujan batu dari langit menghujani kota Sodom. Kota itu dibalikkan.

sections_id.title: Istri yang Durhaka
sections_id.content: Istri Luth termasuk yang binasa karena ia berpihak kepada kaumnya. Ia menoleh ke belakang dan tertimpa azab. Nabi Luth dan putri-putrinya selamat.

sections_en.title: Ibrahim's Nephew
sections_en.content: Prophet Lot was Prophet Ibrahim's nephew. He migrated with Ibrahim from Ur to Palestine. He was then sent to the city of Sodom.

sections_en.title: Deviant People
sections_en.content: Lot's people committed shameful acts never done before - homosexuality. They also robbed and committed evil deeds.

sections_en.title: Rejected Preaching
sections_en.content: Prophet Lot invited his people to repent. But they rejected and threatened to expel Lot from the city.

sections_en.title: Angels Arrive
sections_en.content: Allah sent angels in the form of handsome young men to Lot's house. His people surrounded the house with evil intentions.

sections_en.title: Punishment from Sky
sections_en.content: The angels told Lot to leave with his family and not look back. Then stones rained from the sky on Sodom. The city was overturned.

sections_en.title: Disobedient Wife
sections_en.content: Lot's wife was among those who perished because she sided with her people. She looked back and was struck. Prophet Lot and his daughters were saved.

name: إسماعيل
miracle_id: Menemukan air Zamzam dan membangun Ka'bah
miracle_en: Finding Zamzam water and building the Ka'bah

sections_id.title: Lahir dari Hajar
sections_id.content: Ismail adalah putra pertama Nabi Ibrahim dari Hajar. Kelahirannya adalah jawaban doa Ibrahim yang lama menginginkan keturunan.

sections_id.title: Ditinggal di Mekah
sections_id.content: Atas perintah Allah, Ibrahim membawa Hajar dan Ismail bayi ke lembah tandus di Mekah. Ibrahim meninggalkan mereka dengan sedikit bekal dan kembali ke Palestina.

sections_id.title: Zamzam
sections_id.content: Ketika air habis, Hajar berlari antara bukit Shafa dan Marwa mencari air. Malaikat Jibril memunculkan sumber air Zamzam di dekat kaki bayi Ismail.

sections_id.title: Membangun Ka'bah
sections_id.content: Setelah dewasa, Ismail membantu ayahnya Ibrahim membangun Ka'bah atas perintah Allah. Mereka berdoa: 'Ya Tuhan kami, terimalah dari kami.'

sections_id.title: Ujian Penyembelihan
sections_id.content: Ibrahim bermimpi menyembelih Ismail. Ismail dengan patuh menerima perintah Allah. Ketika pisau diayunkan, Allah mengganti Ismail dengan domba.

sections_id.title: Leluhur Arab
sections_id.content: Ismail menikah dengan wanita dari suku Jurhum. Ia menjadi leluhur bangsa Arab dan nenek moyang Nabi Muhammad SAW.

sections_en.title: Born from Hajar
sections_en.content: Ishmael was Prophet Ibrahim's first son from Hajar. His birth was an answer to Ibrahim's long prayer for offspring.

sections_en.title: Left in Mecca
sections_en.content: By Allah's command, Ibrahim took Hajar and baby Ishmael to a barren valley in Mecca, leaving them with little provisions.

sections_en.title: Zamzam
sections_en.content: When water ran out, Hajar ran between Safa and Marwa seeking water. Angel Jibril brought forth the Zamzam spring near baby Ishmael's feet.

sections_en.title: Building Ka'bah
sections_en.content: After growing up, Ishmael helped his father Ibrahim build the Ka'bah by Allah's command. They prayed: 'Our Lord, accept from us.'

sections_en.title: Sacrifice Test
sections_en.content: Ibrahim dreamed of sacrificing Ishmael. Ishmael obediently accepted Allah's command. When the knife was swung, Allah replaced Ishmael with a ram.

sections_en.title: Ancestor of Arabs
sections_en.content: Ishmael married a woman from the Jurhum tribe. He became the ancestor of the Arabs and forefather of Prophet Muhammad.

name: إسحاق
miracle_id: Lahir dari ibu yang sudah tua
miracle_en: Born from an elderly mother

sections_id.title: Kabar Gembira
sections_id.content: Para malaikat menyampaikan kabar gembira kepada Ibrahim dan Sarah bahwa mereka akan memiliki anak. Sarah tertawa tidak percaya karena ia sudah tua.

sections_id.title: Kelahiran Ajaib
sections_id.content: Sarah melahirkan Ishaq meskipun ia sudah sangat tua. Ini adalah mukjizat dari Allah. Ishaq menjadi putra kedua Nabi Ibrahim.

sections_id.title: Tinggal di Palestina
sections_id.content: Berbeda dengan Ismail yang tinggal di Mekah, Ishaq tinggal bersama ibunya Sarah di Palestina. Ia tumbuh menjadi nabi yang shaleh.

sections_id.title: Leluhur Bani Israil
sections_id.content: Ishaq menjadi leluhur Bani Israil melalui putranya Yaqub. Dari keturunan Ishaq lahir banyak nabi-nabi Bani Israil.

sections_en.title: Good News
sections_en.content: Angels brought good news to Ibrahim and Sarah that they would have a child. Sarah laughed in disbelief as she was old.

sections_en.title: Miraculous Birth
sections_en.content: Sarah gave birth to Isaac despite being very old. This was a miracle from Allah. Isaac became Prophet Ibrahim's second son.

sections_en.title: Living in Palestine
sections_en.content: Unlike Ishmael who lived in Mecca, Isaac lived with his mother Sarah in Palestine. He grew up to be a righteous prophet.

sections_en.title: Ancestor of Israel
sections_en.content: Isaac became the ancestor of the Children of Israel through his son Jacob. From Isaac's lineage, many prophets of Israel were born.

name: يعقوب
miracle_id: Mata yang buta sembuh dengan baju Yusuf
miracle_en: Blind eyes healed by Yusuf's shirt

sections_id.title: Putra Ishaq
sections_id.content: Yaqub adalah putra Nabi Ishaq dan cucu Nabi Ibrahim. Beliau juga dikenal dengan nama Israel, yang berarti hamba Allah.

sections_id.title: Dua Belas Putra
sections_id.content: Yaqub memiliki 12 putra dari beberapa istri. Putra-putranya menjadi nenek moyang 12 suku Bani Israil. Putra kesayangannya adalah Yusuf.

sections_id.title: Kehilangan Yusuf
sections_id.content: Saudara-saudara Yusuf iri dan membuang Yusuf ke sumur. Mereka berbohong kepada Yaqub bahwa Yusuf dimakan serigala. Yaqub sangat sedih hingga matanya buta.

sections_id.title: Kesabaran
sections_id.content: Meskipun sangat sedih, Yaqub tetap sabar dan berserah kepada Allah. Ia tidak pernah putus asa akan rahmat Allah dan terus berdoa.

sections_id.title: Sembuh Kembali
sections_id.content: Setelah bertahun-tahun, baju Yusuf dikirim dari Mesir. Ketika diletakkan di wajah Yaqub, matanya kembali sembuh. Ini adalah mukjizat Allah.

sections_id.title: Bertemu Yusuf
sections_id.content: Yaqub akhirnya bertemu kembali dengan Yusuf di Mesir. Seluruh keluarga pindah ke Mesir dan hidup bahagia. Yaqub wafat di Mesir.

sections_en.title: Son of Isaac
sections_en.content: Jacob was the son of Prophet Isaac and grandson of Prophet Ibrahim. He was also known as Israel, meaning servant of God.

sections_en.title: Twelve Sons
sections_en.content: Jacob had 12 sons from several wives. His sons became ancestors of the 12 tribes of Israel. His favorite was Joseph.

sections_en.title: Losing Yusuf
sections_en.content: Yusuf's brothers were jealous and threw him into a well. They lied that a wolf ate him. Jacob was so sad his eyes became blind.

sections_en.title: Patience
sections_en.content: Despite great sadness, Jacob remained patient and surrendered to Allah. He never lost hope in Allah's mercy.

sections_en.title: Healed Again
sections_en.content: After years, Yusuf's shirt was sent from Egypt. When placed on Jacob's face, his eyes healed. This was Allah's miracle.

sections_en.title: Reunited with Yusuf
sections_en.content: Jacob finally reunited with Yusuf in Egypt. The whole family moved to Egypt and lived happily. Jacob passed away in Egypt.

name: يوسف
miracle_id: Menafsirkan mimpi dan menjadi bendahara Mesir
miracle_en: Interpreting dreams and becoming Egypt's treasurer

sections_id.title: Mimpi Sebelas Bintang
sections_id.content: Yusuf kecil bermimpi melihat sebelas bintang, matahari, dan bulan bersujud kepadanya. Ayahnya Yaqub memahami ini pertanda kemuliaan dan menyuruhnya merahasiakan.

sections_id.title: Dibuang ke Sumur
sections_id.content: Saudara-saudara Yusuf iri karena ia sangat dicintai ayahnya. Mereka membuang Yusuf ke dalam sumur dan berbohong kepada ayahnya.

sections_id.title: Dijual sebagai Budak
sections_id.content: Kafilah menemukan Yusuf di sumur dan menjualnya sebagai budak di Mesir. Ia dibeli oleh Al-Aziz, pejabat tinggi kerajaan.

sections_id.title: Godaan dan Penjara
sections_id.content: Istri Al-Aziz bernama Zulaikha tergoda oleh ketampanan Yusuf. Yusuf menolak dan dijebloskan ke penjara atas tuduhan palsu.

sections_id.title: Menafsir Mimpi
sections_id.content: Di penjara, Yusuf menafsirkan mimpi dua tahanan dengan tepat. Kemudian Raja bermimpi tentang tujuh sapi dan tujuh tangkai. Hanya Yusuf yang bisa menafsirkan.

sections_id.title: Menjadi Bendahara
sections_id.content: Raja mengangkat Yusuf sebagai bendahara Mesir. Yusuf mempersiapkan cadangan makanan menghadapi masa paceklik. Ia menjadi orang kedua berkuasa di Mesir.

sections_id.title: Bertemu Saudara
sections_id.content: Saudara-saudara Yusuf datang ke Mesir mencari makanan saat paceklik. Mereka tidak mengenali Yusuf. Akhirnya Yusuf memaafkan mereka.

sections_id.title: Keluarga Bersatu
sections_id.content: Yusuf mengundang seluruh keluarganya pindah ke Mesir. Yaqub dan saudara-saudara Yusuf bersujud menghormatinya - tepat seperti mimpi masa kecil.

sections_en.title: Dream of Eleven Stars
sections_en.content: Young Joseph dreamed of eleven stars, sun, and moon prostrating to him. His father Jacob understood this as a sign of honor.

sections_en.title: Thrown into Well
sections_en.content: Joseph's brothers were jealous because he was loved most by their father. They threw Joseph into a well and lied to their father.

sections_en.title: Sold as Slave
sections_en.content: A caravan found Joseph in the well and sold him as a slave in Egypt. He was bought by Al-Aziz, a high official.

sections_en.title: Temptation and Prison
sections_en.content: Al-Aziz's wife Zulaikha was tempted by Joseph's beauty. Joseph refused and was thrown into prison on false charges.

sections_en.title: Interpreting Dreams
sections_en.content: In prison, Joseph accurately interpreted two prisoners' dreams. Then the King dreamed of seven cows and seven stalks. Only Joseph could interpret.

sections_en.title: Becoming Treasurer
sections_en.content: The King appointed Joseph as Egypt's treasurer. He prepared food reserves for famine. He became the second most powerful in Egypt.

sections_en.title: Meeting Brothers
sections_en.content: Joseph's brothers came to Egypt seeking food during famine. They didn't recognize Joseph. Eventually Joseph forgave them.

sections_en.title: Family Reunited
sections_en.content: Joseph invited his whole family to move to Egypt. Jacob and brothers prostrated to honor him - just like his childhood dream.

name: أيوب
miracle_id: Sembuh dari penyakit dengan air mata dan kesabaran
miracle_en: Healed from illness through patience

sections_id.title: Harta Berlimpah
sections_id.content: Nabi Ayyub adalah orang yang sangat kaya dengan harta, anak, dan kesehatan. Ia selalu bersyukur kepada Allah dan dermawan kepada fakir miskin.

sections_id.title: Ujian Bertubi
sections_id.content: Allah menguji Ayyub dengan musibah bertubi-tubi. Hartanya habis, anak-anaknya meninggal, dan ia ditimpa penyakit kulit yang parah.

sections_id.title: Dijauhi Manusia
sections_id.content: Karena penyakitnya, masyarakat menjauhi Ayyub. Ia dibuang ke luar kota. Hanya istrinya yang setia merawatnya dengan penuh kasih sayang.

sections_id.title: Kesabaran Luar Biasa
sections_id.content: Meskipun menderita bertahun-tahun, Ayyub tidak pernah mengeluh kepada Allah. Ia tetap bersyukur dan tidak putus harapan. Kesabarannya menjadi teladan.

sections_id.title: Doa Ayyub
sections_id.content: Setelah sekian lama, Ayyub berdoa: 'Ya Tuhanku, sesungguhnya aku ditimpa penyakit dan Engkau adalah Yang Maha Penyayang.' Allah mengabulkan doanya.

sections_id.title: Kesembuhan
sections_id.content: Allah memerintahkan Ayyub menghentakkan kakinya ke tanah. Keluarlah mata air. Setelah mandi dan minum, Ayyub sembuh total dan kembali muda. Allah mengembalikan hartanya dua kali lipat.

sections_en.title: Abundant Wealth
sections_en.content: Prophet Job was very wealthy with property, children, and health. He was always grateful to Allah and generous to the poor.

sections_en.title: Successive Trials
sections_en.content: Allah tested Job with successive calamities. His wealth was lost, children died, and he was struck with severe skin disease.

sections_en.title: Shunned by People
sections_en.content: Due to his illness, society shunned Job. He was cast outside the city. Only his wife faithfully cared for him with love.

sections_en.title: Extraordinary Patience
sections_en.content: Despite suffering for years, Job never complained to Allah. He remained grateful and never lost hope. His patience became an example.

sections_en.title: Job's Prayer
sections_en.content: After so long, Job prayed: 'My Lord, harm has afflicted me, and You are the Most Merciful.' Allah answered his prayer.

sections_en.title: Healing
sections_en.content: Allah commanded Job to strike the ground with his foot. A spring emerged. After bathing and drinking, Job was completely healed. Allah returned his wealth twofold.

lessons_id: Allah tidak menguji di luar kemampuan

name: شعيب
miracle_id: Khatibu'l Anbiya (Orator of the Prophets)
miracle_en: Eloquent speaker among prophets

sections_id.title: Penduduk Madyan
sections_id.content: Nabi Syu'aib diutus kepada penduduk Madyan, kaum pedagang yang suka menipu dalam timbangan dan takaran. Mereka juga menyembah berhala.

sections_id.title: Juru Bicara Handal
sections_id.content: Nabi Syu'aib dikenal sebagai Khatibu'l Anbiya karena kepandaiannya berbicara dan berargumen. Beliau menggunakan kemampuan ini untuk berdakwah.

sections_id.title: Seruan Kejujuran
sections_id.content: Syu'aib mengajak kaumnya untuk jujur dalam berdagang, menyempurnakan timbangan, dan tidak merugikan orang lain. Ia juga mengajak menyembah Allah.

sections_id.title: Penolakan Kaum
sections_id.content: Kaum Madyan menolak dakwah Syu'aib. Mereka mengancam mengusirnya dan para pengikutnya. Mereka tetap berlaku curang dan menyembah berhala.

sections_id.title: Azab Gempa
sections_id.content: Allah menurunkan azab berupa gempa dahsyat dan awan panas. Penduduk Madyan yang kafir binasa. Rumah-rumah mereka runtuh menimpa mereka.

sections_id.title: Keselamatan Mukmin
sections_id.content: Nabi Syu'aib dan para pengikutnya yang beriman diselamatkan dari azab. Mereka menyaksikan bagaimana Allah menghukum orang-orang yang curang.

sections_en.title: People of Madyan
sections_en.content: Prophet Shuayb was sent to the people of Madyan, merchants who cheated in weights and measures. They also worshipped idols.

sections_en.title: Eloquent Speaker
sections_en.content: Prophet Shuayb was known as the 'Orator of Prophets' for his eloquent speech and argumentation. He used this ability for preaching.

sections_en.title: Call for Honesty
sections_en.content: Shuayb called his people to be honest in trade, give full measure, and not harm others. He also invited them to worship Allah.

sections_en.title: People's Rejection
sections_en.content: The people of Madyan rejected Shuayb's preaching. They threatened to expel him and his followers. They continued cheating and idol worship.

sections_en.title: Earthquake Punishment
sections_en.content: Allah sent a severe earthquake and hot cloud as punishment. The disbelieving people of Madyan perished. Their houses collapsed on them.

sections_en.title: Believers Saved
sections_en.content: Prophet Shuayb and his faithful followers were saved from punishment. They witnessed how Allah punished the cheaters.

name: موسى
miracle_id: Tongkat berubah menjadi ular, laut terbelah
miracle_en: Staff became snake, sea parted

sections_id.title: Lahir di Masa Firaun
sections_id.content: Musa lahir saat Firaun memerintahkan membunuh semua bayi laki-laki Bani Israil. Ibunya menaruhnya di peti dan menghanyutkannya di sungai Nil.

sections_id.title: Diasuh Istri Firaun
sections_id.content: Peti bayi Musa ditemukan istri Firaun, Asiyah. Ia jatuh cinta pada bayi itu dan memutuskan mengasuhnya. Musa tumbuh di istana Firaun.

sections_id.title: Membunuh dan Melarikan Diri
sections_id.content: Musa secara tidak sengaja membunuh seorang Mesir yang menzalimi orang Israil. Ia melarikan diri ke Madyan dan tinggal bersama Nabi Syu'aib.

sections_id.title: Wahyu di Bukit Sinai
sections_id.content: Musa melihat api di bukit. Ketika mendekat, Allah berfirman kepadanya dan mengutusnya kembali ke Mesir untuk menghadapi Firaun.

sections_id.title: Menghadapi Firaun
sections_id.content: Musa dan saudaranya Harun datang ke Firaun dengan mukjizat tongkat berubah ular. Para penyihir Firaun kalah dan beriman kepada Allah.

sections_id.title: Sepuluh Tulah
sections_id.content: Allah menurunkan berbagai bencana ke Mesir: darah, katak, kutu, lalat, penyakit ternak, bisul, hujan es, belalang, kegelapan, dan kematian anak sulung.

sections_id.title: Laut Terbelah
sections_id.content: Bani Israil melarikan diri. Di tepi Laut Merah, Musa memukul air dengan tongkat dan laut terbelah dua. Firaun dan tentaranya tenggelam saat mengejar.

sections_id.title: Menerima Taurat
sections_id.content: Di Bukit Sinai, Musa menerima Taurat dari Allah. Ia berpuasa 40 hari. Turunlah Sepuluh Perintah dan hukum-hukum untuk Bani Israil.

sections_en.title: Born Under Pharaoh
sections_en.content: Moses was born when Pharaoh ordered all Israelite baby boys killed. His mother put him in a basket and floated it on the Nile.

sections_en.title: Raised by Pharaoh's Wife
sections_en.content: Baby Moses's basket was found by Pharaoh's wife, Asiyah. She loved him and decided to raise him. Moses grew up in Pharaoh's palace.

sections_en.title: Killing and Fleeing
sections_en.content: Moses accidentally killed an Egyptian who wronged an Israelite. He fled to Madyan and lived with Prophet Shuayb.

sections_en.title: Revelation at Sinai
sections_en.content: Moses saw a fire on a mountain. When he approached, Allah spoke to him and sent him back to Egypt to confront Pharaoh.

sections_en.title: Confronting Pharaoh
sections_en.content: Moses and his brother Aaron came to Pharaoh with the miracle of staff turning to snake. Pharaoh's magicians lost and believed in Allah.

sections_en.title: Ten Plagues
sections_en.content: Allah sent plagues to Egypt: blood, frogs, lice, flies, livestock disease, boils, hail, locusts, darkness, and firstborn death.

sections_en.title: Sea Parted
sections_en.content: The Israelites fled. At the Red Sea, Moses struck the water with his staff and it parted in two. Pharaoh and his army drowned while pursuing.

sections_en.title: Receiving Torah
sections_en.content: At Mount Sinai, Moses received the Torah from Allah. He fasted 40 days. The Ten Commandments and laws for the Israelites were revealed.

name: هارون
miracle_id: Pendamping Musa dalam menghadapi Firaun
miracle_en: Moses's companion against Pharaoh

sections_id.title: Kakak Musa
sections_id.content: Harun adalah kakak kandung Nabi Musa. Ia lebih fasih berbicara. Allah menjadikannya nabi pendamping Musa atas permintaan Musa.

sections_id.title: Pembantu Dakwah
sections_id.content: Harun membantu Musa berdakwah kepada Firaun dan Bani Israil. Ia menjadi juru bicara dan penerjemah. Keduanya bekerja sama dengan harmonis.

sections_id.title: Ujian Sapi Emas
sections_id.content: Saat Musa di bukit Sinai, Samiri membuat patung sapi emas. Bani Israil menyembahnya. Harun berusaha mencegah tapi tidak mampu.

sections_id.title: Wafat di Padang Tih
sections_id.content: Harun wafat di padang pasir Tih sebelum Bani Israil memasuki Tanah Suci. Ia dikuburkan di sebuah gunung yang dikenal sebagai Gunung Harun.

sections_en.title: Moses's Brother
sections_en.content: Aaron was Prophet Moses's older brother. He was more eloquent. Allah made him a prophet to accompany Moses at Moses's request.

sections_en.title: Preaching Helper
sections_en.content: Aaron helped Moses preach to Pharaoh and the Israelites. He served as spokesman and interpreter. They worked together harmoniously.

sections_en.title: Golden Calf Trial
sections_en.content: While Moses was at Mount Sinai, Samiri made a golden calf statue. The Israelites worshipped it. Aaron tried to prevent but couldn't.

sections_en.title: Death in the Desert
sections_en.content: Aaron died in the Tih desert before the Israelites entered the Holy Land. He was buried on a mountain known as Mount Aaron.

name: ذو الكفل
miracle_id: Menanggung dengan sabar segala cobaan
miracle_en: Bearing all trials with patience

sections_id.title: Nabi yang Penuh Kesabaran
sections_id.content: Dzulkifli bermakna 'yang menanggung.' Ia terkenal karena kesabaran luar biasa dalam menghadapi cobaan dan menjalankan amanah.

sections_id.title: Amanah Besar
sections_id.content: Dzulkifli menerima amanah besar untuk memimpin umatnya. Ia berjanji akan shalat malam, puasa siang, dan tidak marah. Ia menepati janjinya.

sections_id.title: Ujian dari Iblis
sections_id.content: Iblis mencoba menggodanya dengan berbagai cara. Iblis menyamar sebagai orang tua yang meminta tolong di waktu istirahat. Dzulkifli tetap sabar.

sections_id.title: Teladan Kesabaran
sections_id.content: Allah memuji Dzulkifli dalam Al-Quran sebagai orang yang sabar. Ia menjadi teladan bagi umat Islam dalam menjalani cobaan hidup dengan tabah.

sections_en.title: Prophet of Patience
sections_en.content: Dhul-Kifl means 'one who bears.' He was famous for extraordinary patience in facing trials and carrying out responsibilities.

sections_en.title: Great Responsibility
sections_en.content: Dhul-Kifl accepted a great responsibility to lead his people. He promised to pray at night, fast by day, and never get angry. He kept his promise.

sections_en.title: Satan's Test
sections_en.content: Satan tried to tempt him in various ways. Satan disguised as an old man asking for help during rest time. Dhul-Kifl remained patient.

sections_en.title: Model of Patience
sections_en.content: Allah praised Dhul-Kifl in the Quran as a patient person. He became an example for Muslims in facing life's trials with resilience.

name: داود
miracle_id: Suara merdu, melunakkan besi, membunuh Jalut
miracle_en: Beautiful voice, softening iron, killing Goliath

sections_id.title: Pembunuh Jalut
sections_id.content: Dawud muda mengalahkan raksasa Jalut (Goliath) dengan ketapel. Tentara Bani Israil takut menghadapi Jalut, tapi Dawud berani dan berhasil membunuhnya.

sections_id.title: Raja dan Nabi
sections_id.content: Dawud menjadi raja Bani Israil sekaligus nabi. Ia memerintah dengan adil dan bijaksana. Rakyat hidup makmur di bawah kepemimpinannya.

sections_id.title: Suara Merdu
sections_id.content: Allah memberi Dawud suara yang sangat merdu. Ketika ia membaca Zabur, gunung-gunung dan burung-burung ikut bertasbih bersama.

sections_id.title: Melunakkan Besi
sections_id.content: Allah melunakkan besi untuk Dawud. Ia bisa membentuk besi seperti tanah liat tanpa api. Ia membuat baju besi untuk perang.

sections_id.title: Kitab Zabur
sections_id.content: Dawud menerima kitab Zabur (Mazmur) dari Allah. Kitab ini berisi doa-doa, pujian, dan hikmah yang sangat indah.

sections_en.title: Slayer of Goliath
sections_en.content: Young David defeated the giant Goliath with a slingshot. The Israelite army feared Goliath, but David bravely killed him.

sections_en.title: King and Prophet
sections_en.content: David became both king and prophet of Israel. He ruled with justice and wisdom. People prospered under his leadership.

sections_en.title: Beautiful Voice
sections_en.content: Allah gave David a very beautiful voice. When he recited the Psalms, mountains and birds would glorify Allah together with him.

sections_en.title: Softening Iron
sections_en.content: Allah softened iron for David. He could shape iron like clay without fire. He made armor for battle.

sections_en.title: Book of Psalms
sections_en.content: David received the Zabur (Psalms) from Allah. This book contains beautiful prayers, praises, and wisdom.

name: سليمان
miracle_id: Menguasai jin, angin, dan memahami bahasa binatang
miracle_en: Controlled jinn, wind, and understood animal language

sections_id.title: Putra Dawud
sections_id.content: Sulaiman adalah putra Nabi Dawud yang mewarisi kerajaan ayahnya. Ia menjadi raja paling kaya dan berkuasa dalam sejarah.

sections_id.title: Memahami Bahasa Binatang
sections_id.content: Allah memberi Sulaiman kemampuan memahami bahasa binatang. Ia bisa berbicara dengan burung, semut, dan hewan lainnya.

sections_id.title: Pasukan Jin
sections_id.content: Jin-jin tunduk kepada Sulaiman dan bekerja untuknya. Mereka membangun istana, menyelam mencari mutiara, dan membuat berbagai benda.

sections_id.title: Angin Sebagai Kendaraan
sections_id.content: Sulaiman bisa mengendalikan angin untuk bepergian. Dalam sehari perjalanan angin, ia bisa menempuh jarak sebulan perjalanan biasa.

sections_id.title: Ratu Saba/Bilqis
sections_id.content: Sulaiman mengundang Ratu Bilqis dari Saba (Yaman). Singgasananya dipindahkan dalam sekejap. Bilqis kagum dan beriman kepada Allah.

sections_id.title: Wafat di Singgasana
sections_id.content: Sulaiman wafat dalam keadaan bersandar pada tongkatnya. Jin-jin tidak tahu ia sudah wafat sampai rayap memakan tongkatnya dan ia terjatuh.

sections_en.title: Son of David
sections_en.content: Solomon was Prophet David's son who inherited his father's kingdom. He became the wealthiest and most powerful king in history.

sections_en.title: Understanding Animal Language
sections_en.content: Allah gave Solomon the ability to understand animal language. He could speak with birds, ants, and other animals.

sections_en.title: Army of Jinn
sections_en.content: Jinn submitted to Solomon and worked for him. They built palaces, dived for pearls, and made various objects.

sections_en.title: Wind as Transport
sections_en.content: Solomon could control the wind for travel. In one day's wind journey, he could cover a month's regular travel distance.

sections_en.title: Queen of Sheba/Bilqis
sections_en.content: Solomon invited Queen Bilqis from Sheba (Yemen). Her throne was transported instantly. Bilqis was amazed and believed in Allah.

sections_en.title: Death on Throne
sections_en.content: Solomon died while leaning on his staff. The jinn didn't know he had died until termites ate his staff and he fell.

name: إلياس
miracle_id: Diangkat ke langit
miracle_en: Raised to heaven

sections_id.title: Nabi untuk Ba'labak
sections_id.content: Ilyas diutus kepada penduduk Ba'labak di Syam. Mereka menyembah berhala bernama Ba'al. Ilyas mengajak mereka menyembah Allah semata.

sections_id.title: Penolakan Kaum
sections_id.content: Kaumnya menolak dakwah Ilyas dengan keras. Mereka tetap menyembah Ba'al dan mengancam akan menyakiti Ilyas.

sections_id.title: Doa Dikabulkan
sections_id.content: Ilyas berdoa agar hujan ditahan dari kaumnya yang durhaka. Allah mengabulkan doanya dan terjadi kekeringan panjang.

sections_id.title: Diangkat ke Langit
sections_id.content: Menurut sebagian riwayat, Ilyas diangkat ke langit seperti Nabi Idris. Beliau termasuk nabi yang dipuji Allah dalam Al-Quran.

sections_en.title: Prophet for Ba'labak
sections_en.content: Elijah was sent to the people of Ba'labak in Syria. They worshipped an idol named Ba'al. Elijah invited them to worship Allah alone.

sections_en.title: People's Rejection
sections_en.content: His people strongly rejected Elijah's preaching. They continued worshipping Ba'al and threatened to harm Elijah.

sections_en.title: Prayer Answered
sections_en.content: Elijah prayed for rain to be withheld from his disobedient people. Allah answered his prayer and a long drought occurred.

sections_en.title: Raised to Heaven
sections_en.content: According to some narrations, Elijah was raised to heaven like Prophet Idris. He is among the prophets praised by Allah in the Quran.

name: اليسع
miracle_id: Melanjutkan dakwah Ilyas
miracle_en: Continued Elijah's preaching

sections_id.title: Penerus Ilyas
sections_id.content: Ilyasa adalah penerus Nabi Ilyas. Ia melanjutkan dakwah kepada Bani Israil setelah Ilyas diangkat ke langit.

sections_id.title: Nabi yang Sabar
sections_id.content: Ilyasa berdakwah dengan penuh kesabaran kepada kaumnya. Ia termasuk nabi yang dipuji Allah dalam Al-Quran sebagai orang pilihan.

sections_id.title: Termasuk Orang Baik
sections_id.content: Allah menyebutkan Ilyasa bersama nabi-nabi lain yang diberi petunjuk. Ia termasuk orang-orang yang baik dan berilmu.

sections_en.title: Successor of Elijah
sections_en.content: Elisha was Prophet Elijah's successor. He continued preaching to the Israelites after Elijah was raised to heaven.

sections_en.title: Patient Prophet
sections_en.content: Elisha preached with great patience to his people. He is among prophets praised by Allah in the Quran as chosen ones.

sections_en.title: Among the Good
sections_en.content: Allah mentioned Elisha with other prophets who were guided. He was among the good and knowledgeable people.

name: يونس
miracle_id: Ditelan ikan paus dan selamat
miracle_en: Swallowed by whale and survived

sections_id.title: Diutus ke Ninawa
sections_id.content: Yunus diutus ke penduduk Ninawa (Irak modern). Mereka adalah kaum yang durhaka dan menyembah berhala. Yunus mengajak mereka bertaubat.

sections_id.title: Meninggalkan Kaum
sections_id.content: Setelah lama berdakwah tanpa hasil, Yunus meninggalkan kaumnya dalam keadaan marah. Ia naik kapal untuk pergi jauh.

sections_id.title: Ditelan Ikan
sections_id.content: Di tengah laut, terjadi badai. Awak kapal mengundi siapa yang harus dilempar. Yunus terpilih dan dilempar ke laut. Seekor ikan besar menelannya.

sections_id.title: Doa dalam Kegelapan
sections_id.content: Dalam perut ikan yang gelap gulita, Yunus berdoa: 'Tidak ada Tuhan selain Engkau. Maha Suci Engkau, sesungguhnya aku termasuk orang yang zalim.'

sections_id.title: Diselamatkan
sections_id.content: Allah menerima taubat Yunus. Ikan memuntahkan Yunus di pantai dalam keadaan lemah. Allah menumbuhkan pohon labu untuk menaunginya.

sections_id.title: Kaumnya Bertaubat
sections_id.content: Penduduk Ninawa akhirnya bertaubat setelah Yunus pergi. Mereka melihat tanda-tanda azab dan segera beriman. Allah memaafkan mereka.

sections_en.title: Sent to Nineveh
sections_en.content: Jonah was sent to the people of Nineveh (modern Iraq). They were disobedient idol worshippers. Jonah called them to repent.

sections_en.title: Leaving His People
sections_en.content: After long preaching without success, Jonah left his people in anger. He boarded a ship to travel far away.

sections_en.title: Swallowed by Fish
sections_en.content: At sea, a storm occurred. The crew drew lots to see who should be thrown overboard. Jonah was chosen and thrown into the sea. A huge fish swallowed him.

sections_en.title: Prayer in Darkness
sections_en.content: In the dark belly of the fish, Jonah prayed: 'There is no god but You. Glory be to You, indeed I was among the wrongdoers.'

sections_en.title: Rescued
sections_en.content: Allah accepted Jonah's repentance. The fish spat Jonah onto the shore in a weak state. Allah grew a gourd plant to shade him.

sections_en.title: His People Repented
sections_en.content: The people of Nineveh eventually repented after Jonah left. They saw signs of punishment and quickly believed. Allah forgave them.

lessons_id: Jangan putus asa dari rahmat Allah

name: زكريا
miracle_id: Diberi anak di usia sangat tua
miracle_en: Given child at very old age

sections_id.title: Pengasuh Maryam
sections_id.content: Zakariya adalah nabi yang saleh dan pengasuh Maryam (ibu Nabi Isa). Ia melihat mukjizat makanan dari Allah untuk Maryam di mihrab.

sections_id.title: Doa untuk Keturunan
sections_id.content: Zakariya sudah sangat tua dan istrinya mandul. Ia sangat ingin keturunan untuk melanjutkan dakwah. Ia berdoa dengan sangat khusyuk.

sections_id.title: Kabar Yahya
sections_id.content: Malaikat menyampaikan kabar gembira bahwa Zakariya akan memiliki putra bernama Yahya. Ini adalah mukjizat karena ia dan istrinya sudah sangat tua.

sections_id.title: Tanda Bisu
sections_id.content: Sebagai tanda, Zakariya tidak bisa berbicara selama tiga hari kecuali dengan isyarat. Kemudian lahirlah Yahya.

sections_id.title: Kesyahidan
sections_id.content: Menurut sebagian riwayat, Zakariya wafat sebagai syahid. Ia dibunuh oleh penguasa zalim. Ia tetap setia kepada Allah hingga akhir.

sections_en.title: Guardian of Mary
sections_en.content: Zechariah was a righteous prophet and guardian of Mary (mother of Prophet Jesus). He witnessed miraculous food from Allah for Mary in her chamber.

sections_en.title: Prayer for Offspring
sections_en.content: Zechariah was very old and his wife was barren. He desperately wanted offspring to continue preaching. He prayed with great devotion.

sections_en.title: News of John
sections_en.content: An angel brought good news that Zechariah would have a son named John. This was a miracle as he and his wife were very old.

sections_en.title: Sign of Silence
sections_en.content: As a sign, Zechariah couldn't speak for three days except by gestures. Then John was born.

sections_en.title: Martyrdom
sections_en.content: According to some narrations, Zechariah died as a martyr. He was killed by a tyrant ruler. He remained faithful to Allah until the end.

name: يحيى
miracle_id: Lahir dari orang tua yang sangat tua dan mandul
miracle_en: Born from very old and barren parents

sections_id.title: Kelahiran Ajaib
sections_id.content: Yahya lahir dari ayah yang sudah sangat tua (Zakariya) dan ibu yang mandul. Kelahirannya adalah mukjizat langsung dari Allah.

sections_id.title: Diberi Hikmah Sejak Kecil
sections_id.content: Allah memberi Yahya hikmah dan pemahaman agama sejak kecil. Ia sangat saleh, berbakti kepada orang tua, dan tidak sombong.

sections_id.title: Zuhud dan Ibadah
sections_id.content: Yahya hidup sangat zuhud dan sederhana. Ia makan dari tanaman liar dan menghabiskan hidupnya untuk beribadah dan berdakwah.

sections_id.title: Menyambut Isa
sections_id.content: Yahya adalah sepupu Nabi Isa. Ia menyambut dan membenarkan kenabian Isa. Keduanya saling mendukung dalam dakwah.

sections_id.title: Syahid
sections_id.content: Yahya wafat sebagai syahid. Ia dibunuh oleh penguasa zalim karena menyampaikan kebenaran. Ia tetap teguh hingga akhir hayatnya.

sections_en.title: Miraculous Birth
sections_en.content: John was born from a very old father (Zechariah) and a barren mother. His birth was a direct miracle from Allah.

sections_en.title: Wisdom from Childhood
sections_en.content: Allah gave John wisdom and religious understanding from childhood. He was very pious, dutiful to parents, and not arrogant.

sections_en.title: Asceticism and Worship
sections_en.content: John lived very simply and ascetically. He ate from wild plants and spent his life worshipping and preaching.

sections_en.title: Welcoming Jesus
sections_en.content: John was Prophet Jesus's cousin. He welcomed and affirmed Jesus's prophethood. They supported each other in preaching.

sections_en.title: Martyrdom
sections_en.content: John died as a martyr. He was killed by a tyrant ruler for speaking the truth. He remained steadfast until his last breath.

name: عيسى
miracle_id: Lahir tanpa ayah, menyembuhkan orang buta dan kusta, menghidupkan orang mati
miracle_en: Born without father, healed blind and lepers, raised dead

sections_id.title: Kelahiran dari Maryam
sections_id.content: Isa lahir dari Maryam tanpa ayah. Malaikat Jibril meniupkan ruh ke dalam rahim Maryam atas perintah Allah. Ini adalah mukjizat besar.

sections_id.title: Berbicara di Buaian
sections_id.content: Ketika Maryam dituduh berzina, bayi Isa berbicara membela ibunya: 'Sesungguhnya aku hamba Allah. Dia memberiku Kitab dan menjadikanku nabi.'

sections_id.title: Mukjizat Penyembuhan
sections_id.content: Dengan izin Allah, Isa menyembuhkan orang buta sejak lahir, orang berpenyakit kusta, dan menghidupkan orang mati. Ia juga membuat burung dari tanah liat.

sections_id.title: Injil
sections_id.content: Isa menerima kitab Injil dari Allah. Ia berdakwah kepada Bani Israil untuk menyembah Allah semata dan mengikuti ajaran yang benar.

sections_id.title: Pengikut yang Setia
sections_id.content: Isa memiliki dua belas murid setia yang disebut Hawariyyun. Mereka membantu menyebarkan dakwah dan beriman kepada Isa.

sections_id.title: Diangkat ke Langit
sections_id.content: Ketika orang Yahudi ingin membunuhnya, Allah mengangkat Isa ke langit. Ia tidak mati disalib. Ia akan turun kembali di akhir zaman.

sections_en.title: Birth from Mary
sections_en.content: Jesus was born from Mary without a father. Angel Gabriel breathed the spirit into Mary's womb by Allah's command. This was a great miracle.

sections_en.title: Speaking in Cradle
sections_en.content: When Mary was accused of adultery, baby Jesus spoke defending his mother: 'I am indeed a servant of Allah. He gave me the Book and made me a prophet.'

sections_en.title: Healing Miracles
sections_en.content: By Allah's permission, Jesus healed those blind from birth, lepers, and raised the dead. He also made birds from clay.

sections_en.title: Gospel
sections_en.content: Jesus received the Gospel (Injil) from Allah. He preached to the Israelites to worship Allah alone and follow true teachings.

sections_en.title: Faithful Disciples
sections_en.content: Jesus had twelve faithful disciples called the Hawariyyun. They helped spread the message and believed in Jesus.

sections_en.title: Raised to Heaven
sections_en.content: When the Jews wanted to kill him, Allah raised Jesus to heaven. He was not crucified. He will return at the end of time.

lessons_en: Jesus is Allah's servant not son

name: محمد
miracle_id: Al-Quran, Isra Miraj, pembelahan bulan
miracle_en: The Quran, Night Journey, splitting of moon

sections_id.title: Yatim Sejak Kecil
sections_id.content: Muhammad lahir dalam keadaan yatim. Ayahnya Abdullah wafat sebelum ia lahir. Ibunya Aminah wafat saat ia berusia 6 tahun. Ia diasuh kakeknya dan pamannya.

sections_id.title: Al-Amin
sections_id.content: Muhammad dikenal sebagai Al-Amin (yang terpercaya) dan As-Shadiq (yang jujur). Masyarakat Mekah sangat menghormatinya karena akhlaknya yang mulia.

sections_id.title: Wahyu Pertama
sections_id.content: Pada usia 40 tahun, malaikat Jibril datang di Gua Hira dan menyampaikan wahyu pertama: 'Bacalah dengan nama Tuhanmu yang menciptakan.'

sections_id.title: Dakwah di Mekah
sections_id.content: Muhammad berdakwah di Mekah selama 13 tahun. Ia menghadapi penolakan, penyiksaan, dan boikot dari kaum Quraisy. Pengikutnya disiksa dan dibunuh.

sections_id.title: Isra Miraj
sections_id.content: Allah membawa Muhammad dari Masjidil Haram ke Masjidil Aqsa, kemudian naik ke Sidratul Muntaha. Di sana diperintahkan shalat lima waktu.

sections_id.title: Hijrah ke Madinah
sections_id.content: Muhammad hijrah ke Madinah bersama para sahabat. Di Madinah, ia membangun masyarakat Islam pertama. Ia menjadi pemimpin agama dan negara.

sections_id.title: Penaklukan Mekah
sections_id.content: Setelah 8 tahun di Madinah, Muhammad menaklukkan Mekah tanpa pertumpahan darah. Ia memaafkan semua musuhnya dan menghancurkan berhala di Ka'bah.

sections_id.title: Haji Wada
sections_id.content: Muhammad melaksanakan haji terakhir (Haji Wada) dan menyampaikan khutbah persamaan manusia. Tak lama setelahnya, beliau wafat di Madinah.

sections_en.title: Orphan from Childhood
sections_en.content: Muhammad was born an orphan. His father Abdullah died before he was born. His mother Aminah died when he was 6. He was raised by grandfather and uncle.

sections_en.title: The Trustworthy
sections_en.content: Muhammad was known as Al-Amin (the trustworthy) and As-Sadiq (the truthful). Meccan society greatly respected him for his noble character.

sections_en.title: First Revelation
sections_en.content: At age 40, angel Gabriel came to Cave Hira and delivered the first revelation: 'Read in the name of your Lord who created.'

sections_en.title: Preaching in Mecca
sections_en.content: Muhammad preached in Mecca for 13 years. He faced rejection, torture, and boycott from the Quraysh. His followers were tortured and killed.

sections_en.title: Night Journey
sections_en.content: Allah took Muhammad from Masjid al-Haram to Masjid al-Aqsa, then up to Sidrat al-Muntaha. There the five daily prayers were commanded.

sections_en.title: Migration to Medina
sections_en.content: Muhammad migrated to Medina with his companions. In Medina, he built the first Islamic society. He became religious and state leader.

sections_en.title: Conquest of Mecca
sections_en.content: After 8 years in Medina, Muhammad conquered Mecca without bloodshed. He forgave all his enemies and destroyed the idols in Ka'bah.

sections_en.title: Farewell Pilgrimage
sections_en.content: Muhammad performed his final pilgrimage (Hajj Wada) and delivered a sermon on human equality. Shortly after, he passed away in Medina.
